title: Sierra Leone Colleagues Mourn Dr. Salia, Who Succumbed To Ebola
teaser: Dr. Martin Salia died at a hospital in Omaha, Neb., after being evacuated from Sierra Leone, where he worked as a surgeon in several hospitals. Mourners gathered at a hospital where he worked.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
